summary: SummaryHighlightsCruelty FreeVeganHOURGLASS Equilibrium Rebalancing Cream Cleanser is rebalancing cleanser that removes impurities and delivers intense hydration, transforming dull and stressed skin with youthful radiance.
details: DetailsBenefitsNon-comedogenicHighly concentrated formula produces a rich lather that removes dirt, oil and debrisHydrating formula helps protect skin's natural moisture barrierFree of sulfates and harsh surfactantsGentle enough to use morning and eveningDoesn't leave the skin feeling dry or tightpH-balanced formulaVegan and cruelty freeKey IngredientsHOURGLASS Amino Youth Lipids: Accelerates natural cell turnover and replenishes moisture with restoring lipids for radiant, youthful-looking skinAgastache Mexicana Flower Extract: Preserves moisture and helps soothe skin for youthful radianceFormulated WithoutAlcoholGlutenParabensPhthalatesSulfatesTalcItem 2623379How To UseDispense a dime-sized amount into damp hands and work in a circular motion to create a creamy lather. Massage onto wet skin, avoiding the eye area. Rinse thoroughly with warm water. Use morning and evening.IngredientsGlycerin, Potassium Cocoyl Glycinate, Water/Aqua, Butylene Glycol, Polyglyceryl-10 Myristate, Glyceryl Stearate Se, Glycol Distearate, Citric Acid, Fragrance/Parfum, Propanediol, Phenoxyethanol, Limonene, Hydroxypropyl Methylcellulose, Linalool, Citronellol, Agastache Mexicana Flower/Leaf/Stem Extract, Phosphatidylglycerol, Lecithin, BHT.*Ingredient lists and claims may change or vary from time to time as part of HOURGLASS's commitment to innovation and maintaining global compliance. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product packaging you receive to ensure the ingredients are suitable for your personal use.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Dispense a dime-sized amount into damp hands and work in a circular motion to create a creamy lather. Massage onto wet skin, avoiding the eye area. Rinse thoroughly with warm water. Use morning and evening.
ingredients: BHT.*Ingredient lists and claims may change or vary from time to time as part of HOURGLASS's commitment to innovation and maintaining global compliance. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product packaging you receive to ensure the ingredients are suitable for your personal use
